CxSystem¶

This is the documentation for CxSystem, a flexible cortical simulation framework, implemented in python over Brian2 module.

The CxSystem is intended for easy and efficient numerical simulation of biomimetic spiking network cortical models. The model is constructed in two csv files, and the program itself can be run using CxSystem.py.

The CxSystem has an open source code, and can be freely used under GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3 (see Copying.txt). The articles describing the details and testing of the framework is under peer review.
